title: [OCS] Reload eSports is Looking for a Head Coach
body:
Reload eSports is currently looking to employ a head coach for our OCS League of Legends team. 

Responsibilities
- Attendance to all OCS games, scrims, and any other competitions Reload may enter (3 - 5 sessions every week)
- Leading the team during team trainings and warm ups
- Providing feedback to players and staff on a weekly basis

The Perks:
- Baseline salary
- Healthy financial incentives linked to success
- Work with a dedicated team backed by a professional org with a physical premises

All applicants must meet the following requirements:
Fluency in English
Willing to travel for events 
At least 2 years coaching/analyst experience
Positive mindset, including:
Willingness to learn
Competitive spirit
Passion for the eSports, especially in Oceania

To apply, please send an application to management@reloadesports.com including:
Name
Summoner Name/IGN
Age
Coaching experience
About yourself
Motivation for joining Reload eSports
Current location
References

You can find more about us here:

[Reload eSports](http://reloadesports.com)

[The Barracks](http://www.thebarracks.com.au/)
